item.title: EP 101 - The 1490 Meteor Event
item.itunes:title: The 1490 Meteor Event
item.description:
Today we examine a spoooookkkkkyyyy photo, then we dodge meteorites!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

"The Cooper Family Photo" is an eerie picture. Is there a man falling thought the ceiling at the very moment the photo is taken? Was an image of a cursed spirit captured? Or is it all an elaborate hoax?

Then we look at deadly meteor strikes. They are rare and a handful of people have died . . .but there is a story of a city in China that may make you think twice before wishing on a shooting star.

Links:

The Cooper Family Falling Body Photo

http://hoaxes.org/weblog/comments/falling_body_photo

Debunked: Cooper/Copper family ghost photo

https://www.metabunk.org/debunked-cooper-copper-family-ghost-photo.t5536/

1959: The Cooper Family Ghost Photo

http://anomalyinfo.com/Stories/1959-cooper-family-ghost-photo

Thomas Ligotti Online

http://www.ligotti.net/photoplog/index.php?s=603c6358a4c4550f05b422dc56cc32f0&n=2112

1490 Ch'ing-yang event

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1490_Ch%27ing-yang_event

Meteorite falls in China and some related human casualty events

http://articles.adsabs.harvard.edu/full/1994Metic..29..864Y

Human Casualties in Impact Events

http://adsabs.harvard.edu/full/1997JIMO...25..222G

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadrabbitradio/

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
